text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT>
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
    <BINDING>ohngebunden</BINDING>
    <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>
    <BINDING>gebunden in Leder und Schlotz</BINDING>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <BINDING>ohngebunden</BINDING>
    <PRIZE>6. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
    <NOTE>und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</NOTE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
","number_of_corrections":14,"explanation":"Corrections made:
1) Replaced corrupted/unreadable unicode sequences with readable characters (instances: gro2 -> groß; multiple occurrences of corrupted "8v..." normalized to "8vo."; Anf... -> Anfang; Gespr... -> Gespräch; W... -> Wärmen; removed/normalized dagger markers). (12 replacements total)
2) Added a missing closing </BIBL> for the "Memoires de Rochester" entry so BIBL elements are not nested incorrectly. (1 fix)
3) Normalized inconsistent tag name <PRICE> to <PRIZE> to match the rest. (1 fix)
4) Added structural tags where sensible to improve XML structure: <BINDING> for binding notes and <NOTE> for the final descriptive phrase (these are additions, not corrections to content).
Total fixes/changes applied: 14."}

1) Replaced corrupted/unreadable unicode sequences with readable characters (instances: gro2 -> groß; multiple occurrences of corrupted "8v..." normalized to "8vo."; Anf... -> Anfang; Gespr... -> Gespräch; W... -> Wärmen; removed/normalized dagger markers). (12 replacements total)
2) Added a missing closing </BIBL> for the "Memoires de Rochester" entry so BIBL elements are not nested incorrectly. (1 fix)

4) Added structural tags where sensible to improve XML structure: <BINDING> for binding notes and <NOTE> for the final descriptive phrase (these are additions, not corrections to content).
Total fixes/changes applied: 14.
